00002 #define INTSTYLE_H_
00003 
00004 #include "Style.h"
00005 
00006 namespace TenUI{
00007         class IntStyle : public Style {
00008         public:
00009                 IntStyle(int initValue){ value = initValue; }
00010                 virtual ~IntStyle(){}
00011                 
00012                 virtual any getValue(){
00013                         return value;
00014                 }
00015                 virtual void setValue(const any& newValue){
00016                         if(newValue.type() == typeid(int)){
00017                                 value = any_cast<int>(newValue);
00018                         }
00019                 }       
00020                 virtual shared_ptr<Style> clone(){
00021                         shared_ptr<IntStyle> newInst(new IntStyle(value));
00022                         newInst->declaration = declaration;
00023                         return newInst;
00024                 }
00025                 
00026         protected: 
00027                 int value;
00028         };
00029 }

00031 #endif /*INTSTYLE_H_*/
